programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: A new series of joyful junior baking! It's Cake Day for the heat one bakers as they put a novelty twist on the classic Victoria sandwich and recreate their mascot in cake form.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Max's Bar & Grill: Gordon visits New Jersey to transform Max's Bar & Grill. It's been serving up famous hotdogs for almost 100 years, but is close to collapse.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: DannyDonnieJoeyJonJordan: Adam and Barry find Erica's old collection of New Kids on the Block memorabilia in the cluttered garage and tease her mercilessly.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Darryl Dawkins Dance: As the school dance approaches, Erica asks Beverly to help her find Barry a date to keep him away from her best friend Lainey.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Do Pizza Bots Dream of Electric Guitars: Homer tries to reunite a mechanical band from his youth, but film and TV creator JJ Abrams gets hold of them first.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Uncut Femmes: Marge gets involved in a jewel heist and learns that there's more to Sarah Wiggum than anyone suspected.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Iberville Cuisine and Oyster Bar: Gordon helps Iberville Cuisine and Oyster Bar, in New Orleans, as they prepare for the Super Bowl being hosted in the city's Caesars Superdome.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Iberville: The Nightmare Continues: Gordon's still helping Iberville Cuisine, in New Orleans' French Quarter. Will the staff walk out and implement their plan B?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Trilogy of Error: Homer gets his thumb sliced off while trying to steal a brownie. Lisa misses the school bus. Bart discovers Fat Tony's stash of smuggled fireworks.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I'm Goin' to Praiseland: Ned opens a Christian amusement park. At first, the tame religious attractions are unpopular. But then visitors start having visions...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpsons Tall Tales: A hobo regales the family with unique takes on classic American tales starring the Simpsons as Connie Appleseed, Paul Bunyan and Tom Sawyer.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Sorry Not Sorry: Lisa calls her teacher a hack and refuses to apologise. Then she learns Ms Hoover's private pain.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Just Say No: As the presidential election approaches, Erica's shocked to discover that Beverly always just votes for the same candidate as Murray.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: As You Wish: Murray's happy when Adam tells him that he wants to take up a new activity at school - until he discovers that that activity is fencing.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil's Sexy, Sexy House: At Jay and Gloria's post-Thanksgiving leftovers brunch, everyone agrees to sneak into Mitch and Cam's friend's sexy, sleek house for a bit of fun.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Clean Out Your Junk Drawer: Gloria wins a bid at the school auction for a family seminar with famous doctor and self-help book author Debra Radcliffe.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: M.E. Time: Peralta annoys his colleagues when his attempts to get together with an attractive medical examiner delay an autopsy report.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa's Sax: The family recall the story of when Lisa got her saxophone. It all started when the school psychologist told Marge and Homer that her talent needed to be nurtured...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror VIII: Mayor Quimby insults the French government, who launch a neutron bomb in retaliation. Homer escapes the blast and finds himself alone in Springfield.

programme.title: Assassin Club
programme.desc: (2023) Action with Henry Golding and Sam Neill. An assassin wants to retire for love, but his handler has entered him into a deadly game of hit the hitman. Can he survive to live his dream?

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: (2018) Action comedy starring Mila Kunis and Kate McKinnon. Two friends become embroiled in espionage after one of them gets dumped by a man she didn't even know was a spy. Surprise!

programme.title: Birds of Passage
programme.desc: (2018) Hallucinatory drama charting the rise of the Colombian marijuana trade through its very immediate and profound effect on an indigenous Wayuu tribe. In Wayuu/Spanish/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Getting Personal
programme.desc: Deepa Shastri meets conceptual artist Louise Stern to find out why she left the safety of her deaf 'bubble' in America for the London art scene, where no one knew how to sign.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: (1956) Western with Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine, Rod Steiger and Valerie French. A cowboy is given a job by a rancher, sparking lethal jealousy in a colleague and desire in the boss's wife.

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: (1942) Swashbuckling adventure with Laird Cregar and Tyrone Power. Privateer Captain Henry Morgan tries to rid the Caribbean of pirates when he's made Governor of Jamaica. Bit rich.

programme.title: The Lady Eve
programme.desc: (1941) Screwball romcom with Barbara Stanwyck and Henry Fonda. A con artist is forced to change tack when she falls for her mark and he dumps her for trying to con him in the first place.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: (2004) All-action thriller. Queen Latifah stars as the driver of the fastest taxi in New York, who teams up with an inept cop (Jimmy Fallon) to catch a team of female bank-robbers.

programme.title: The Dive
programme.desc: (2023) Maximilian Erlenwein's breath-holding underwater survival thriller about two sisters on a fateful diving expedition, starring Louisa Kause and Sophie Lowe.

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: (2020) Sci-fi horror with Kristen Stewart. Disaster strikes at an underwater facility when seabed drilling causes an earthquake, drawing the attention of a lurking menace.

programme.title: Crawl
programme.desc: (2019) Soggy, snappy reptilian horror with Kaya Scodelario. A talented swimmer must use her water-based skills to evade a congregation of alligators during a flood.

programme.title: Real
programme.desc: (2019) Heartfelt romantic drama. In Portsmouth, a new couple hide their real, working-class circumstances from each other and invent alternate lives. Can their love survive the truth?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: It Came from Outer Space
programme.desc: (1953) Richard Carlson stars as an astronomer who sees an alien craft land. But nobody believes him - until the cloning starts in Jack Arnold's science-fiction classic.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: (1965) Thriller. Sidney Poitier plays a photojournalist aboard a destroyer whose commander's obsessive hunt for a Soviet sub could plunge the world into nuclear war.

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: (1954) Swashbuckling adventure. One of King Arthur's courtiers, the Viking Prince Valiant (Robert Wagner) uncovers the evil Sir Brack's (James Mason) plot to kill the king. Can he foil him?

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: (2017) Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams star in the Golden-Globe-winning, toe-tapping smash hit musical about the life and times of P.T. Barnum, who created the circus.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost...
programme.desc: ...Protocol: (2011) Part four of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The Impossible Missions Force fight to clear their name, while also trying to avert nuclear war. Busy, busy, busy!

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Flag Day
programme.desc: (2021) Crime drama based on a true story, directed by and starring Sean Penn as a talented counterfeiter who's not so good as a father. Features Penn's real-life kids Dylan and Hopper Jack.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a drifter who arrives in a small border town and tangles with a group of villains after helping a wealthy young Mexican, played by Manuel Rojas.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: (1966) Classic sci-fi adventure. Raquel Welch and Donald Pleasence are among the crew of a miniaturised submarine that's injected into an injured diplomat's body in a bid to save his life.

programme.title: The Black Shield of Falworth
programme.desc: (1954) Medieval action-adventure starring Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh. When a peasant discovers his true lineage, he sets out to woo his noble sweetheart and avenge his father's murder.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: (2016) Poignant drama starring Dev Patel and Nicole Kidman. A man who was separated from his family as a child embarks on a journey to find his way back home.

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: No Exit
programme.desc: (2022) Thriller. A recovering addict ends up stranded at a remote visitor centre in a snowstorm with four strangers, then finds a kidnapped girl in the car park. Question is: who did it?

programme.title: Assassin Club
programme.desc: (2023) Action with Henry Golding and Sam Neill. An assassin wants to retire for love, but his handler has entered him into a deadly game of hit the hitman. Can he survive to live his dream?

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: (2018) Action comedy starring Mila Kunis and Kate McKinnon. Two friends become embroiled in espionage after one of them gets dumped by a man she didn't even know was a spy. Surprise!

programme.title: Birds of Passage
programme.desc: (2018) Hallucinatory drama charting the rise of the Colombian marijuana trade through its very immediate and profound effect on an indigenous Wayuu tribe. In Wayuu/Spanish/subs.

programme.title: Alex Armstrong Tonight
programme.desc: Join Alex for two hours of lively debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the big issues of the day with Alex's fresh take on every story.

programme.title: Alex Armstrong Tonight Late Edition
programme.desc: Tomorrow's news, tonight. All the major stories making the front pages and full coverage of all the breaking news at home and abroad with Alex Armstrong.

programme.title: The Camilla Tominey Show Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from this morning. Join Camilla Tominey for a Sunday morning politics show with personality, live from Westminster.

programme.title: Free Speech Nation
programme.desc: Where journalism and comedy meet - round up of the best and most infuriating stories of Andrew Doyle's week, including a comedy take on the week.

programme.title: Breakfast with Eamonn and Ellie
programme.desc: Join Eamonn Holmes & Ellie Costello to start your day across the United Kingdom. This is your breakfast show. Join the conversation about what is happening in our nation and the world.

programme.title: Britain's Newsroom
programme.desc: Andrew and Miriam present Monday to Thursday mornings. When the news happens, it happens here. GB News brings you the biggest stories and the answers you need from across the UK.

programme.title: Good Afternoon Britain
programme.desc: Tackling the big stories from all angles and perspectives. Weekdays from midday, Tom Harwood and Nana Akua bring you the most compelling stories from across the United Kingdom.

programme.title: Martin Daubney
programme.desc: Join Martin for an up-to-the-minute take on the day's events delivered in his own unique and lively style.

programme.title: Dewbs & Co
programme.desc: Plain-speaking, straight-talking - Michelle delivers her individual take on the day's news.

programme.title: Farage
programme.desc: Nigel Farage doesn't hold back in his GB News prime-time show. Hear his views and give your own in an hour of discussion and debate. Join Nigel as he takes on the big stories other media won't touch.

programme.title: Jacob Rees-Mogg's State Of The Nation
programme.desc: Join Jacob for his unique and unmissable take on the day's news.

programme.desc: Join Patrick for two hours of spirited debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the issues that matter, with a sharp take on every story.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Volvo P1800/Morris Milk Float: Dave gets wind of a possible free lunch at the officers' mess when he heads off to collect a stylish Swedish Volvo P1800S from an RAF base in the Midlands.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Ford Escort Mexico: Derek has sold everything from trucks to bicycles - but he can't remember the last time he auctioned off a two-seater plane.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Bedford Caravanette/MGC: An impressive collection of five iconic cars arrives at Thornton le Dale, including a 1967 Crayford Corsair and a 1966 Ford Zodiac which emerge from a garage in Selby.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Cortina 2000E/Daimler V250: Nothing screams 1970s more than a Mk3 Ford Cortina 2000E. Derek Mathewson heads to Brigg to value a 1974 example with classic Coke bottle styling and a Pinto engine.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Ford Cosworth/Morgan 4/4: Dave goes to Wales to bag a Sierra Cosworth, a sought-after car in the bidding market. Dad Derek gets his hands on a more sedate 1926 Standard Tourer.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from Home.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Ballymena to Carrickfergus: Michael Portillo visits a museum in Belfast Lough telling the story of Ireland's railway heritage and learns of the important role of Carrickfergus.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Bangor to Belfast: Michael Portillo makes his way from Bangor to Belfast, along the way enjoying live music on a boat and visiting the parliament building at Stormont.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Carlingford to Dublin: Michael Portillo makes his way from the vast beaches of the Carlingford Peninsula to the capital of the Republic of Ireland, Dublin.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Dun Laoghaire to Rosslare: Michael Portillo travels from the capital of the Republic of Ireland, Dublin, on the DART suburban railway to the harbour town of Dun Laoghaire.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Montego: The Restoring Classics team pays tribute to mid-80s-Midlands by breathing new life into what was once the fastest production MG ever made - the Montego Turbo.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: CZ & Nova: The team break with tradition and actually follow Dave Mathewson's advice on what to restore - he points to a 1992 Vauxhall Nova Merit Plus!

programme.title: The Great War In Numbers
programme.desc: Endgame: Hear how the arrival of American forces and an Allied counter-offensive in 1918 helped defeat Germany. Tragically, 11,000 men were killed or injured on Armistice Day.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler's War
programme.desc: This Has Happened: Hitler's War moves to its endgame as the Soviets cross the German border - with a death toll of over 40 million, a new, scarred Europe will emerge.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Morden Hall Park: Fiona Bruce is at Morden Hall Park in South London, where items include a plate designed by Pablo Picasso and a self-portrait by John Lennon and Yoko Ono.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Second World War Special: Dover Castle stages an edition aired to mark 80 years since the start of the Second World War, bringing insights into the conflict.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
